headerDisplay: This plugin works with ESP devices flashed with Tasmota Firmware. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

disableAccessory.title: Disable Accessory
disableAccessory.description: Here You can disable this accessory.

heatDryFanMode.title: Heat
heatDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Heat, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

coolDryFanMode.title: Cool
coolDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Cool, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

autoDryFanMode.title: Auto
autoDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Auto, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

enable.title: Activate
enable.description: This enable external remote sensor for A.C. device.

path.title: Path
path.description: Here set the path to the external temperature sensor.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: Here set the sensor data refresh time in (sec).

name.title: Name
name.description: Your own name displayed in Homebridge/HomeKit app.

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices].miElHvac.presets[arrayIndices].mode === heat || return model.devices[arrayIndices].miElHvac.presets[arrayIndices].mode === cool || return model.devices[arrayIndices].miElHvac.presets[arrayIndices].mode === auto;
